name: nifti-reader-js
description: A JavaScript NIfTI file format reader.

scripts.build: rm -rf build; mkdir build; tsc; browserify --standalone nifti dist/src/nifti.js -o build/nifti-reader.js; uglifyjs build/nifti-reader.js -o build/nifti-reader-min.js
scripts.doc: rm -rf build; mkdir build; ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md src/*.js > build/docs.md
scripts.test-js: npm run build; npm run release; mocha --timeout 0 tests

author: Michael Martinez
